## equality() function

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function equality<T>(lhs: T, rhs: T): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lhs | T | A value to compare. |
|  rhs | T | Another value to compare. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
